Visa Information

  • Home
  • Attend
  • Visa Information

A Business Visa is the ideal Visa type required for you to attend a conference. The details of the various types of Visas are available on The Republic of Zambia's Department of Immigration Website

Business Visa Requirements

To apply for a Business Visa to enter the Republic of Zambia, applicants are REQUIRED to provide the following:
  1. Passport sized photo
  2. Passport copy of applicant
  3. Cover letter on company letterhead with full address and contact numbers addressed to the Director-General (you may wish to adapt the provided Cover Letter template)
  4. Invitation from host company (email: etd2024-info@unza.zm to request for an invitation letter after successfully registring)
  5. Certified copy of certificate of incorporation of host company (This is NOT necessary as The University of Zambia is a Public University of the Republic of Zambia established through the University Act of 1966)

Nationals Who Do Not Require Visa

  • The Republic of Zambia's Department of Immigration has a list of countries that do not require visas to enter the Republic of Zambia.
  • You MUST verify this list by initiating the application process and/or DIRECTLY CONTACTING The Department of Immigration
The following is the list of Visa except countries (Please verify the list by DIRECTLY CONTACTING The Department of Immigration):
Aland Islands · Angola · Anguilla · Antigua and Bermuda · Australia · Australian Antarctic Territory · Austria · Azores · Bahamas · Bahrain · Barbados · Belgium · Belize · Bermuda · Botswana · British Antarctic Territory · British Indian Ocean Territory · British Virgin Islands · Bulgaria · Canada · Canary Islands · Cayman Islands · Channel Islands · China · Croatia · Cyprus · Czech Republic · Denmark · Dominica · Estonia · Falkland Islands · Falkland Islands Dependencies · Fiji Islands · Finland · France · French Guiana · Germany · Gilbraltar · Greece · Grenada · Guadeloupe · Hungary · Iraq · Ireland · Isle of Man · Italy · Jamaica · Japan · Kenya · Kiribati · Kuwait · Latvia · Lesotho · Lithuania · Luxembourg · Madeira · Malawi · Malaysia · Maldives · Malta · Marshall Islands · Martinique · Mauritius · Mayotte · Montenegro · Montserrat · Mozambique · Namibia · Nauru · Netherlands · New Zealand · Niue · Norfolk Island · Norway · Oman · Pitcairn Islands · Poland · Portugal · Qatar · Reunion · Romania · Ross Dependency · St. Helena · St. Kitts and Nevis · St. Lucia · St. Martin · St. Vincent and Grenadines · Samoa · Saudi Arabia · Serbia and Montenegro · Seychelles · Singapore · Slovakia · Slovenia · Solomon Islands · South Africa · South Korea · Spain · Swaziland · Sweden · Tanzania · Tokelau · Tonga · Trinidad and Tobago · Turks and Caicos Island · Tuvalu · Uganda · United Arab Emirates · United Kingdom · United States of America · Vanuatu · Western Samoa · Zimbabwe
